fullplot: The daughter of the werewolf from AWIL is alive and living in Paris where her mother (from the first film) and stepfather are trying to overcome her lycanthropic disease. A trio of American tourists on a thrill seeking trip around Europe manage to stop her from plunging to her death from the top of the Eiffel tower and are embroiled in a horrific but often hilarious plot involving a secret society of werewolves based in the city and a drug which allows werewolves to change at any time... This time there's no need for a full moon...
plot: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.
title: An American Werewolf in Paris
writers: John Landis (characters in An American Werewolf in London)
